solution_line_template: First find how many demerits Andy got for showing up late: {demerits_per_late_instance} demerits/time * {late_instances} times = <<{demerits_per_late_instance}*{late_instances}={demerits_from_late}>>{demerits_from_late} demerits

Then subtract the number of demerits he's gotten so far to find how many more he can get before getting fired: {max_demerits} demerits - {demerits_from_late} demerits - {demerits_from_joke} demerits = <<{max_demerits}-{demerits_from_late}-{demerits_from_joke}={remaining_demerits}>>{remaining_demerits} demerits
